page.title: 13Leisure in Clayton-le-Woods
page.content:
{Leyland Golf Course}(opened 1924) East of Leyland on A49 18 holes, length 5980 yards, SSS 69 Catering facilities available Front 9 Parkland, back 9 Moorland
{Shaw Hill Golf Club}(opened 1925) South of Whittle-le-Woods on A6 18 holes, length 6139 yards, SSS69 Catering facilities available Parkland course
{Cuerden Valley Park}(opened 1980) South of Whittle-le-Woods on A6 Town Brow west of Whittle on B5256 Walking, fishing, horse riding, wild-life habitats
{Boatel Cruises} West of Wheelton on A674 Cruises on Leeds - Liverpool canal
